price: ߌ ߘߌ߫ ߛߐ߲߬ߡߊ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߙߎߝߊߣߍ߲߫ ߖߟߐ߬ߞߐ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَصۡفَادِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: watarā al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin muqarranīna fī al-aṣfādi
